item.description:
All levelsbeginner to advanced-
we can work together and become local wordpress experts-
Choose your sandwich and bring me $5 BY TODAY AT 3PM AT THE LATEST

when you rsvp list your sandwich choice and link to your wordpress site.

if you need help setting up wordpress on a host server list your hosting company-
and read this: http://codex.wordpres......if you need help email me

This way we can get situated to physically work with wordpress itself during our
wordpress user group meetings!


Parking details:
# Metered and unmetered parking is available on Elm Street, Green Street, Round Hill Road, Henshaw Avenue, Prospect Street, and other city streets close to Smith and Clarke School campuses.

# After 5:00 p.m., and until 1:00 a.m., visitors may park in any white or blue-lined space on campus or in the Smith College Parking Garage, located at 42 West Street.
item.how_to_find_us: Smith Art Museum-on left library-go in- on left study room w/ lg table & lg proj

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Wordpress User Group and Sandwiches
